DOC.brief_summary: This open label study subject fail Protocol PGN-1300 . Adult subject ( great 18 year old ) present mildly infect diabetic foot ulcer ( IDSA criterion ) full thickness ( i.e. , dermis involve joint capsule , tendon , bone ) fail PGN-1300 . Subjects must also provide informed consent meet entry criterion enrol receive PluroGel PN .
DOC.brief_title: Topical PluroGel PN Treatment Mildly Infected Diabetic Foot Ulcers
